alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 10:51AM CDT until March 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Band of Moderate to Heavy Snow to Develop over Central Wisconsin... .A band of moderate to even heavy snow develops across central Wisconsin by early this afternoon and may produce 4 to 6 inches of snow before weakening this evening. Given the potential for snowfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour, roadways may become snow covered and slick. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. This snow will likely fall in a narrow band with lesser amounts on either side of it. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery to hazardous road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
